指南者教育的文化是“务实、分享、进取、正直”。务实：凡事要以结果为导向；分享：在帮助别人变得更好的同时，自己变得更好；进取：保持好奇心，探索自己未来的多种可能，正直：追随内心，恪守每个岗位的底线。

职位描述:
Description

As a test engineer you will  participate node level feature verification of Ericsson LTE RAN product. This  position requires LTE knowledge and black test experience in LTE RAN product,  as well as quick learning ability for coming 5G.

The candidate will mainly focus on all  E2E test activities to secure quality of the functionalities of the responsible  features in 4G/LTE area. E2E test activities involve requirements analysis, testing  cases development, legacy uplift cases development if needed, verification  environment setup, testing cases execution, problem troubleshooting and customer  support, test summary and sharing.

Qualifications

·         Familiar  with the 3GPP protocol. Strong 5G/LTE/WCDMA product and system knowledge.
·         Familiar  with general testing methodology and technologies.
·         Familiar  with the software integration and verification process.
·         Familiar  with the LTE lab environment, testing tools and equipments, such as TM500/E500/LTEsim/UCtool/iPerf/UE  Control/Autotest/CTX/CPRI Converter (CT10/11) /Log Tools
·         Experience  of test automation and testing tool development, familiar with UNIX environment  and Python/Java scripts.
·         Good  troubleshooting skills and problem-solving capability.
·         Good  communication and verbal English skills.
·         Good  English writing and documentation skills.
·         Good  teamwork spirit with ability to work independently and self-driven, be able to  work under pressure.
·         Experience  of working with customer is preferred.
·         Having  Java based software development experience is preferred.

职位描述:
We believe work is not a place, but rather a thing you do. Our technology revolves around this core philosophy. We are relentlessly committed to helping people work and play from anywhere, on any device. Innovation, creativity and a passion for ever-improving performance drive our company and our people forward. We empower the original mobile device:  YOU!












Citrix ADC is an industry leading application delivery and load balancing solution that provides a high-quality user experience for your web, traditional, and cloud-native applications regardless of where they are hosted.

Citrix SDWAN is our next-generation WAN Edge solution, which delivers flexible, automated, secure connectivity and performance that keeps the workspace always-on.



·       Resolve escalated customer issues and maintain ownership until the problem resolved completely with minimal over site from more senior members of the team

·       Act as an effective technical interface between the customer and 3rd Level Engineering / Product Development - by providing clear issue documentation and by leveraging productive cross-functional working relationships in their area of expertise

·       Act as a SME (Subject Matter Expert) in at least one core Citrix product and a resource for less senior members of the team as needed to troubleshoot and resolve specific customer issues. Develops an understanding of at least one adjacent product

·       Write & review complex technical articles and case studies for the knowledge base leveraging the customer reported cases, product specifications, and previous experience

·       Develop and review intermediate level technical training for internal and external audiences in at least one core Citrix product



·       5+ years hands on troubleshooting experience on Network System in enterprise level environments

·       Understands the operating system resource management and builds OS level and/or network debugging skills in position

·       Ability to build code or script literacy while in position with the goal to have the ability to read and understand existing code and or scripts

·       Excellent logical thinking, problem solving and communication skills

·       Solid English Written/Speaking skills to co-work with other teams in different region

·       Rich knowledge of Web technology like: HTTP/HTML/JavaScript/PHP/ASP

·       Rich knowledge of Networking (Routing, Switching, Firewall, TCP/IP, etc.)

·       Rich knowledge of L7 protocols (such as FTP, DHCP, DNS, etc.)

·       Knowledge of Operation System, especially Linux/FBSD



·       C programming and debugging

·       Experience of coding with Shell, Python or Perl

·       Database skills

·       CCNP/CCIE/MCSE/RHCE/RHCA Networking/OS certificates

·       Citrix product certifications are a plus;

职位描述:
HFC semiconductor is a new  300mm fab startup company focusing on advanced Logic, MRAM and other technology  nodes. We are looking for candidates who are interested in doing hands-on  work on OPC modeling, RET/SMO and metrology. As an HFC OPC modeling Engineer,  you will join a dynamic team working on technology development/transfer, fab  startup, EDA software qualification, CDSEM data acquisition and Source  evaluation.
·       B.S., M.S. degree (or above) in Optics, Physics, Chemistry, Chemical  Engineering, Materials Science, Electronic & Electrical Engineering, Mechanical  Engineering or related fields is required.
·       3+ years hands-on working experience on OPC modeling, CDSEM  metrology and/or Litho process is highly desired.
·       Proficiency with Unix and Linux OS is required.
·       Familiarity with Python/Tcl, Unix shell scripting (and other  scripting languages) is a big plus.
·       Deliver functional OPC models for the advanced technology nodes.
·       Work in clean-room to acquire the metrology data for OPC modeling.
·       Conduct source optimization and evaluate its wafer performance.
·       Work with upstream and downstream process owners and other  departments to meet their needs on high quality OPC models.
·       Prepare and present the model reports.
·       Knowledge of semiconductor industry and OPC software programing.

职位描述:
我们的工程师是什么样的人？
无论在业余时间用怎样的态度对待编程，我们在工作中，目的是解决问题，做好产品，而不是「写代码」。
对我们来说，语言、框架、应用，都只是工具。学习一个新的东西，就像游戏里升级和调整技能树一样稀松平常。
我们相信产品好不好，看数据；而不是自己的感觉。
我们每天面对困难，我们也会遇到挫折和迷茫。勇气让我们不会退缩，知识、技巧、理性指导我们采取行动。
如果你觉得我们可能是同类，不妨认识一下，我们永远期盼能遇到臭味相投的人，并有机会一起工作。
- 负责HPC集群管理系统的设计和开发工作，包括资源管理、监控系统、自动化部署、生命周期流程、作业调度、计费信息等；
- 涉及到的技术栈包括：LSF、Slurm、ELK、Prometheus、Redis、Consul、IPMI等等；
- 熟悉Linux操作系统，拥有Linux开发经验，熟悉python及shell脚本编程、系统编程、网络编程优先；

职位描述:
图灵视频（Turing Video）成立于2017年，总部位于美国硅谷，致力于安防科技研发，是一家高科技前沿的人工智能公司。图灵视频由清华大学和美国加州大学分校博士生联合创立，并由上市公司、美国知名VC及国内著名投资人真格基金徐小平联合投资。其拥有机器人技术和计算机视觉领域的先驱团队，开发了先进的深度学习、边缘计算和自我巡逻技术。
图灵致力于机器人、人工智能、视频分析、用户界面、安全、系统集成、云存储和数据分析等高科技技术发展，且已与各大安全公司和系统集成商之间建立了良好的协作关系，希望扩大其业务，为客户提供更优质的解决方案，详情请访问我们的官网 www.turingvideo.com。
图灵***个产品自主巡逻机器人已经销往全世界，包括美国、新加坡、日本、澳大利亚、欧洲和南美洲等。由于销量的迅速增加和业务的急剧扩大，现在急需扩充开发团队。
去年已经为国内头部地产商企业提供了视频分析和智能机器人产品，取得多个8位数订单。本公司已在2018年完成一千万美金的A轮融资，计划在2019年达到十倍的B轮融资。

诚聘机器人软件开发工程
职位要求:
本科及以上学历，本科主修计算机科学/电子工程/自动化专业。熟悉机器人基本理论，了解机器人感知、定位、导航等相关算法和控制理论。理解机器人系统的运行逻辑，具备较强的动手能力和解决问题的能力，能够独立处理异常情况；

● 负责机器人系统的部署及测试；
● 完善已有的机器人软件系统，解决用户场景中的具体问题；
● 与研发团队密切合作，完善机器人产品的可用性；

● 自动化、电子工程、计算机科学或相关专业本科及以上学历；
●  2年以上机器人相关开发经验；
● 精通 C/C++、Python，具有2年以上的工程开发经验；
● 熟悉机器人感知、导航等相关算法的基本逻辑；
● 了解基本的控制理论，并能够运用于机器人系统；
● 具备以下核心技能的一种或多种：激光雷达信号处理、图像处理、传感器信息融合算法；
● 熟悉 Linux 操作系统，能熟练使用系统工具及网络配置工具等；
● 有较强的逻辑/抽象思维能力，善于分析、归纳、描述、沟通和解决问题；
● 专业基础知识扎实，逻辑思维能力强，英文读写能力强；
● 具备快速学习能力，敢于接受挑战，积极参与团队合作；


有自动驾驶，机器人开发相关经验者优先；
有 ROS 系统使用经验优先；
有深度学习系统项目开发经验优先；
有 SLAM 算法学习经验，实习经验或项目开发经验优先；
有 Android 系统项目开发经验优先；

福利: 五险一金||餐饮补贴||过节福利||高温费
职位描述:
岗位职责：
1. 利用机器学习、数据挖掘算法与模型，融合海量时空数据、行业数据、物联网数据，研发智慧城市相关应用场景下的解决方案。例如，我们提出的解决方案有：
i)  智慧交通：
- 基于转换点识别算法及随机森林/SVM等机器学习模型进行城市居民混合出行链所涉出行方式的提取与推断，结合POI及路网数据建立居民行为相似度模型。
- 基于HMM模型将低采样率、高噪声的交通轨迹与路网进行匹配，计算实时交通路况。
ii）城市规划：
- 利用交通轨迹、城市路网、及POI，挖掘城市功能区、城市火山及城市黑洞。
iii）智慧环保：
- 基于时间特征（气候、交通分布等）及空间特征（POI分布、路网分布等）的协同训练模型，发掘城市空气污染主因。
v）工业大数据：
- 基于深度学习算法对工业设备建立健康模型，预测设备故障；基于聚类算法发掘故障根因。
2.  配合大数据开发工程师，将算法与模型转化为实际应用，使解决方案得以落地。
3.  根据业务需求对算法模型进行调优，对解决方案进行迭代。
职位要求:
：
1. 下列两者满足其一：
i）硕士及以上学历，1年以上年工作或项目经验。计算机、地理信息、统计、数学等专业优先。
ii）本科及以上学历，机器学习、数据挖掘算法或研发工程师 3年以上工作/科研经验。

Enhance the machine learning, especially deep learning knowledge.

Assist team to upgrade and evaluate the skills of the project members.

Participate in more innovation projects and pilot projects, more V2X etc. knowledge.

Benchmark for existing products, compare w/ Ford products, in order to optimize customer real needs.

According to existing C&V components to design test tools, target to optimize and simplify test process.
* 调研各组建的自动化测试可行性，设计及开发自动化测试。
Investigate possibility of automation test for each component, design and develop test scripts.
* 参与并主导福特内部各类创新及试验项目开发设计。
Join and lead Ford internal innovation and pilot projects design & development.
* 对项目自动化测试及脚本构架提出修改及建议，评估。
Right of suggestion about R&D project;
* 主导创新及改变目前软件构架。
Lead Ford internal innovation and IT architecture optimization.

Communicate with extern clients and deliver presentations on the report.

Other tasks and responsibilities assigned by line manager or the management.

Experience in CAN bus tools, such as CanOE, Value CAN.

HFC Semiconductor是一家新的300毫米晶圆厂初创公司，专注于14纳米逻辑电路，MRAM和其他技术节点。我们正在招聘在工程，科学和数学领域具有扎实学术背景的新大学毕业生，加入我们的OPC（光学邻近校正）部门，以学习和开发OPC建模，编程，验证和质量控制技术，推进半导体节点。 OPC是一项关键技术，可将电路正确印刷到半导体晶圆上。候选人将加入一个充满活力和经验丰富的团队，致力于OPC技术的开发和维持，技术鉴定，产量提升以及实现稳定的大批量生产。我们将提供培训和轮换，以帮助新工程师成长。

职位描述:
Trend Micro Mobile Security is a mobile app providing comprehensive protection for Android devices. It safeguards against virus, privacy issue, fraudulet websites and provides other system utilites.
Trend Micro IoT Security Android version is a solution working on Android System providing comprehensive protection for Android devices.
The Mobile Security team is looking for a talent to develop new products and solutions on various Mobile environments (mainly on Android, iOS is a plus.).
The job responsibility includes:
Strengthen security pitches upon Android environment, including Android application, framework and Android IoT solutions.
-Design and implement new user-facing features in Trend Micro's products.
-Build the libraries and frameworks that support sophisticated security features or user engaging features.
-Optimize mobile applications on Android platform.
-Develop security feature on Android system level .
-Writing design spec, quality codes and unit tests.
Minimum qualifications:
-BA/BS degree in Computer Science or related technical field or equivalent practical experience.
-1-3 years of relevant work experience.
-Experience in mobile application development and/or Android System development. Programming experience in Java and/or C/C++
-Working proficiency and communication skills in verbal and written English.
Preferred qualifications:
-1 or more years of Android application development experience.
-1 or more years of Linux driver development experience.

职位: 资深软件配置管理工程师
工作地址: 安德门大街52号世茂城品B座14层
公司: 趋势科技（中国）有限公司
公司行业: 计算机软件,计算机服务(系统、数据服务、维修)
福利: 弹性工作||定期体检||补充医疗保险||股票期权||员工旅游||五险一金||专业培训
职位描述:
This job is to work with Product Development team in the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) to assist the projects to release products or services with the advanced knowledge of DevOps tool chain. We are constantly pushing updates and iterating on all of our products and services. Using your leadership and technical expertise, you will communicate with product development team and lead the complex application releases for production and develop major improvements to tools and processes in the whole software release cycle. Support and improve our tools for release process related to CI/CD, Infra as code, Test automation, etc.:

1.Management of CI process and release artifacts (source code, document and release build) with multiple systems (Perforce, Git, Nexus, Docker, Jira)
2.Provide release process and tool chain consultant service to development teams.
3.Watching and Evaluating the new industrial technologies on DevOps tool chain.
4.Plan, design, implement and optimize the release process and system.
For this position, we expected he/she can share knowledge, best practice with colleagues, and will be assigned to specific projects which he/she will be full responsible for above area. In this position, he/she will keep his/her skills up-to-date by working with the latest technologies.

Qualifications:
1.Strong experiences on CI/CD solution setup for official software product release.
2.Familiar with multiple DevOps relevant tools like: GitHub, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Ansible, Python and etc.
3.Familiar with public cloud solution like: AWS, Azure.

职位描述:
This job is to work with Product Development team in the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) to assist the projects to release products or services with the advanced knowledge of DevOps tool chain. We are constantly pushing updates and iterating on all of our products and services. Using your leadership and technical expertise, you will communicate with product development team and lead the complex application releases for production and develop major improvements to tools and processes in the whole software release cycle. Support and improve our tools for release process related to CI/CD, Infra as code, Test automation, etc.:

1.Management of CI process and release artifacts (source code, document and release build) with multiple systems (Perforce, Git, Nexus, Docker, Jira)
2.Provide release process and tool chain consultant service to development teams.
3.Watching and Evaluating the new industrial technologies on DevOps tool chain.
4.Plan, design, implement and optimize the release process and system.
For this position, we expected he/she can share knowledge, best practice with colleagues, and will be assigned to specific projects which he/she will be full responsible for above area. In this position, he/she will keep his/her skills up-to-date by working with the latest technologies.

Qualifications:
1.Strong experiences on CI/CD solution setup for official software product release.
2.Familiar with multiple DevOps relevant tools like: GitHub, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Ansible, Python and etc.
3.Familiar with public cloud solution like: AWS, Azure.

职位描述:
无论在业余时间用怎样的态度对待编程，我们在工作中，目的是解决问题，做好产品，而不是「写代码」。
对我们来说，语言、框架、应用，都只是工具。学习一个新的东西，就像游戏里升级和调整技能树一样稀松平常。
我们相信产品好不好，看数据；而不是自己的感觉。
我们每天面对困难，我们也会遇到挫折和迷茫。勇气让我们不会退缩，知识、技巧、理性指导我们采取行动。
如果你觉得我们可能是同类，不妨认识一下，我们永远期盼能遇到臭味相投的人，并有机会一起工作。
- 负责HPC集群管理系统的设计和开发工作，包括资源管理、监控系统、自动化部署、生命周期流程、作业调度、计费信息等；
- 涉及到的技术栈包括：LSF、Slurm、ELK、Prometheus、Redis、Consul、IPMI等等；
- 熟悉Linux操作系统，拥有Linux开发经验，熟悉python及shell脚本编程、系统编程、网络编程优先；

作为一名安全工程师，你将会参与到趋势核心技术部门进行全球化威胁分析研究。需要做到知攻善守，在与网络威胁对抗中，不断创新和研发核心技术和解决方案，实用到趋势的各类产品中，为守护一个安全的数字世界贡献自己的力量。你日常的工作包括但不限于

职位: 高级软件开发工程师(云运维开发)
工作地址: 九龙湖国际企业园

职位描述:
Position Overview
Citrix is rapidly developing and expanding its portfolio of large-scale cloud applications across all product lines, including app/desktop virtualization, networking, and content collaboration. These applications must deliver enterprise-grade performance, reliability, and integration while leveraging consumer internet economies of scale in multiple clouds (and in hybrid scenarios that reach behind the enterprise firewall). This requires excellent architecture and dev-ops process in software development, operations, and site reliability engineering.

Responsibilities
Work with the development teams to design scalable, robust systems using cloud architecture

Build automation using industry tools (like Jenkins, Ansible, etc.) to deploy hundreds of different services

Ensure a high degree of availability across all of our service offerings

Be proficient in one or more cloud providers, including AWS, Azure, GCP

Have experience writing applications using C#, Python, or JavaScript Identify bottlenecks and problems throughout the infrastructure

Basic Qualifications
Prefer to build automation to perform redundant tasks rather than manually handling toil

Enjoy pushing scalability to the limit with high throughput services

Design solutions with failure in mind to ensure reliability

Enjoy working with a large variety of services and technologies

Like looking through metrics and logs as if it were a treasure hunt

Avoid logging into servers directly and prefer using automation and aggregation to manage them

Strive to be a responsible enabler rather than a "gate"

职位描述:
We believe work is not a place, but rather a thing you do. Our technology revolves around this core philosophy. We are relentlessly committed to helping people work and play from anywhere, on any device. Innovation, creativity and a passion for ever-improving performance drive our company and our people forward. We empower the original mobile device:  YOU!







Together with other talented engineers, you will be responsible for develop software and provide hands-on technical expertise to design, deploy, and optimize Cloud services. Drive technical architecture and standards/process to deliver the best customer experience.



·       Develop software to enhance Cloud services delivery and management.

·       Analyze service performance to improve quality and customer experience.

·       Ensure 24/7 service availability of Citrix Cloud - address reported issues and provide root cause analysis.

·       Work with Product Development, Product Management, QA, and Customer Success teams to ensure successful deployments and address service delivery issues.



·       1-2  years of experience building Cloud services and distributed systems – deployment, monitoring, scaling, debugging, etc.

·       Solid experience of coding with javascript, C#, or JAVA, python, etc.

·       Experience with source control and continuous integration tools a plus -  Git/Stash, BitBucket, Jenkins.

·       Hands on experience public cloud providers - Amazon AWS, Microsoft Azure, IBM Softlayer

·       BS in Computer Science or equivalent experience

·       Excellent verbal and written communication skills



·       You have industry experience providing hands-on technical expertise to design, deploy, secure and optimize Cloud services

·       Experience with container technologies: Kubernetes, Docker

职位描述:
指南者教育成立于2012年，是一家提供留学申请服务、英语培训、数据分析培训的在线教育公司。我们相信，互联网对教育行业的改造将会是彻底的。秉承着“互联网+教育”的运营思路，指南者教育致力于打造让更多用户满意的学习及服务产品。
指南者教育的文化是“务实、分享、进取、正直”。务实：凡事要以结果为导向；分享：在帮助别人变得更好的同时，自己变得更好；进取：保持好奇心，探索自己未来的多种可能，正直：追随内心，恪守每个岗位的底线。
在这里你可以得到每年10天以上的年假，符合国家规定的五险一金以及带薪病假；
在这里没有办公室政治，鲜有上下级概念，团队氛围融洽；
在这里公司为每一位员工提供完善的培训体系，广阔的发展平台和晋升空间。
1.        参与数据科学相关课程产品的开发，完成场景设计、课程教学、练习设置等环节；
2.        搜集数据科学行业热点、落地应用、竞品发展等，进行课程体系的设计及迭代优化；
3.        负责对学员教学成果的追踪、学生作业问题的解答，积极推动课程质量的提升
1.        数据科学相关专业（如数学、统计、计算机、金融工程等）研究生毕业，名校毕业生优先考虑，拥有较强的学术功底；
2.        要求熟练使用Python语言以及常用类库，熟悉整个大数据的完整处理流程，熟悉人工智能领域的相关算法者优先；
3. 热爱沟通，具有良好的亲和力，乐于分享和传授经验；
4. 拥有认真负责的工作态度，细心严谨的工作习惯；
